description:
At a glance

Expert's Rating

Pros

  • Excellent contrast ratio and color gamut
  • Good HDR brightness
  • Superb motion clarity at 240Hz
  • Supports USB-C with 90 watts of Power Delivery

Cons

  • Aggressive display curve is divisive
  • Stand is too large
  • High MSRP compared to rivals
title: Acer Predator X34 monitor review: Going all-in on the curve

description:
The Steam Deck might be the most popular Linux PC ever, though you’d be forgiven if you haven’t realized that its SteamOS software is technically Linux. The Proton compatibility layer is the Steam Deck’s special sauce, allowing games made for Windows to run on Linux without a massive headache. Now Valve is apparently testing a version for ARM hardware.

“Proton-arm64ec-5” is not public, but was spotted in the SteamDB.info database (reported by Tom’s Hardware), with that “arm6
title: ARM version of Steam Deck’s Proton layer spotted in testing

description:
GaN chargers are the future, so now’s as good a time as any to get ahead of the curve and start benefiting from them sooner than later.

Right now, this Anker Nano USB-C GaN charger is on sale for $15 at Amazon, which is a nice 35 percent off its normal price.

There are several advantages to upgrading to GaN chargers. Our very own resident in-house expert Gordon Ung made the switch after realizing just how much power they pack despite how tiny they are, plus how much luggage space he can save while on the go.

More on that: W
title: Charge your phone faster with Anker’s $15 USB-C GaN charger

description:
Hold up! A gaming laptop with an Intel Core i7 CPU and an RTX 4050 graphics card for just $800? That’s an absolute steal, and you can get it right now because this HP Victus laptop is on sale at Best Buy. Getting $300 off on this high-performance laptop is a real deal.

As mentioned, this HP laptop runs on the 12th-gen i7-12650H processor, a chip that can easily handle any games you want to play as well as any hobby or work tasks. Its 16GB of RAM will definitely help with speed, loading times, and overall laptop performance, too.

Once you get this one delivered to your door, you’ll also see just how great the RTX 4050 graphics can be, no matter if you’re
title: This RTX-powered HP gaming laptop is on sale for $800 right now
